snippet: The Shanghai Quartet played Mozart, Bright Sheng (with the pianist Peter Serkin) and Dvorak’s in a passionate performance on Sunday at the 92nd Street Y.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of classical music works, including premiere by Bright Sheng, performed by Shanghai Quartet and accompanied by pianist Peter Serkin at 92nd Street Y.
lead_paragraph: The Shanghai Quartet played Mozart, Bright Sheng (with the pianist Peter Serkin) and Dvorak’s in a passionate performance on Sunday at the 92nd Street Y.

headline.seo: Perter Serkin and the Shanghai Quartet at the 92nd Street Y
headline.main: Sherpas Lead Way to a Feverish Finish
headline.print_headline: Sherpas Lead Way to a Feverish Finish
